programme.title: Arsenal x Brighton
programme.desc: Pela 38ª rodada, o Arsenal recebe o Brighton & Hove Albion no Emirates Stadium. Os Gunners vêm de quatro vitórias e têm pequenas chances de se classificar à Liga Conferência. Já os Seagulls, que garantiram a permanência na elite, só cumprem tabela.

programme.title: Palmeiras x Universitario
programme.desc: Pela 6ª rodada do grupo A, o Palmeiras recebe o Universitario no Allianz Parque. O Verdão busca fechar a primeira fase com a melhor campanha geral, o que lhe garantiria sempre decidir em casa no mata-mata. Los Cremas brigam por vaga na Sul-Americana.

programme.title: Flamengo x Vélez Sarsfield

programme.title: Eibar x Barcelona
programme.desc: Pela 38ª rodada, o Eibar recebe o Barcelona no Estádio Municipal de Ipurúa. Após sete anos na elite, os Armeros buscam se despedir de cabeça erguida. O Barça, por outro lado, já está classificado para a Champions, mas não tem mais chances de título.

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Bonnie is depressed about all the losers she's been dating lately, so Ben and Danny decide to turn her love life into a contest. Whoever sets her up with a decent guy wins, and each brother is determined to win.

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Tucker's latest failed relationship prompts him to focus on the one that got away - his college girlfriend, Olivia. In an effort to cheer their friend up, Ben and Danny track her down. Meanwhile, Riley abuses her corporate card and gets in trouble.

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: When Bonnie's yearly fling proposes to her, Bonnie panics and says she's in love with Tucker. Meanwhile, Ben and Tucker pose as sailors in an effort to move on. Riley and Ben's relationship is in limbo, especially when Danny meets Riley's co-worker.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Sue has had enough of boyfriend Jeremy and wants to break up with him. But not knowing how to do it, she asks Axl for some of his worldly advice. Meanwhile, Brick tries his best to show school spirit and fit in with his fellow high schoolers.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Frankie and Mike are embarrassed to admit that they once again forgot Brick's birthday, but their embarrassment turns to fright when they discover that he has turned 15, and it's time for them to teach their not-so-sure-footed son driver's ed.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Frankie has come to the conclusion that April is not good enough for Axl and does everything in her power to keep her out of their annual Christmas family photo.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Although excited about finding a new discount store that sells oddly shaped fruits and vegetables, Frankie is devastated when Axl refuses to talk to her or even answer her texts after inadvertently admitting how she feels about April in front of him.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Trashy neighbour Rita Glossner talks an apprehensive Frankie into taking a road trip to an unknown destination. Mike takes an embarrassing fall at the quarry and has to deal with even more embarrassment when OSHA is called in to investigate.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, Sue is forced to keep a huge secret from the family; after agreeing to watch the neighbour's three kids, Brick finds himself trying to hide from them, as they had such a good time that they keep wanting to come over and play.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: The Hecks find themselves spending New Year's Day attempting to stave off a zombie apocalypse in the Orson Escape Room, desperately trying to beat the Donahue's record of getting out with more than one minute, eight seconds to spare.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Frankie is ecstatic when she wins free maid service for a month. But the Heck house turns out to be quite the frustrating challenge to clean. Mike and Rusty start looking for assisted living facilities for their father.

programme.title: The Middle

programme.desc: On April 17, 2015, a Virginia hunter stumbles upon a grisly discovery in the woods: a woman with an execution style gun shot wound to the back of her head. As detectives begin their investigation, they uncover a twisted web of lies and crimes.

programme.title: Grave Mysteries
programme.desc: New Year's Eve 2009, Mikarah Sanders is shot in a home invasion. Police search for the intruder by diving into her digital world, where they learn the killer has been under their noses all along, driven by rage to commit a shocking crime of passion.

programme.title: The Night That Didn't End
programme.desc: In the suburbs of Atlanta, Georgia, a pregnant mother and her fiancé are kidnapped on the night before their baby shower. When the fiancé's family receives ransom calls shortly after, there's no mistake that the couple's lives are hanging by a thread.

programme.title: Southern Gothic
programme.desc: When a young husband is shot dead in his Morris, Alabama home, police initially believe it's a robbery gone awry. But once the town rumor mill swirls to life, authorities uncover a dark secret hiding between the pews of the local Baptist church.

programme.title: Obsession: Dark Desires
programme.desc: Following her divorce, Cristi buys a new home that needs work. Hoping handyman Curtis can fix it up, she ends up getting more than she bargained for. Curtis becomes fixated with Cristi and will stop at nothing until she becomes his.

programme.title: Dead Silent
programme.desc: After 15-year-old Jasmine Block mysteriously vanishes into thin air, her mother Sarah launches a crusade to find her before it's too late. But when the sickening truth behind Jasmine's disappearance surfaces, it leaves Sarah in shock.

programme.title: Dark Days of Summer
programme.desc: When 19-year-old Lisa Taylor goes missing on a warm summer night in Salisbury, Maryland, family and friends hope that she made a spur of the moment decision to take a road trip. But as days and weeks pass with no sign of her, they fear the worst.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: '48 Hours' provides the first in-depth look into the death of a beloved college cheerleader and the case against her boyfriend.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: In Texas police set a trap for a would-be killer. Officers put a plan into action, and Body Cam reveals a deadly plot. In Florida, a high-speed chase leads police into a dangerous swamp. But when a K9 locates the suspect, the arrest turns into a rescue.

programme.title: Dark Days of Summer
programme.desc: When 19-year-old Lisa Taylor goes missing on a warm summer night in Salisbury, Maryland, family and friends hope that she made a spur of the moment decision to take a road trip. But as days and weeks pass with no sign of her, they fear the worst.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A Texas man targeted by a hit man fights for the life of the person who ordered the murder; his son.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: In Georgia, a suspected drug dealer won't go down without a fight. In Ohio, police fear for their lives when faced with an ambush from a hidden gunman. After a high-speed chase, a fleeing driver has one more surprise for Macomb County Deputies.

programme.title: Dead Silent
programme.desc: When 16-year-old aspiring film producer Bohdi Potter and her boyfriend go missing, the grave truth behind their disappearance lies deep in the hollow corridors and dark caverns of an old, abandoned military bunker.

programme.title: Homicide City
programme.desc: When Ellen Robb's husband finds her murdered in their quiet suburban Philadelphia home, evidence initially points to a robbery gone wrong. But as police dig deeper into the couple's life, they learn the motive may be far more sinister.

programme.title: Homicide City
programme.desc: The city of Philadelphia is in shock when hard-working mother Trish McDermott is gunned down on a Center City sidewalk. Detectives work around the clock to catch the killer, someone they soon discover is more dangerous than they ever could imagine.

programme.title: 20/20 on ID
programme.desc: A teen vanishes on her way home from school. Weeks later a puzzling letter from her arrives in the mail. This is the story of a desperate search for a girl hidden in plain sight, and her tale of bravery and resilience in the face of terror.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Jason and Lindsey Lee are destined for each other; however, marriage can have its highs and lows. When the young couple decide to change their lifestyle to reignite the spark in the relationship, it comes with deadly consequences.

programme.title: In Plain Sight
programme.desc: When a dismembered body is found on the edge of Phoenix, it turns out to be travelling jewellery salesman Jay Orbin. While he adored his exotic dancer wife Marjorie, turns out she had a few lovers on the side, giving police several suspects.

programme.title: In Plain Sight
programme.desc: Mathew Solomon can't find his wife Lisa after an argument on Christmas Eve. After a tearful press conference and city-wide search she is found strangled to death and abandoned in a garbage bag, and the true story behind her murder is anything but festive.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Some say Cameron Todd Willingham was wrongfully convicted, and the court put an innocent man to death. But Stacy Kuykendall knew Todd better than anyone, and she's convinced that he was a monster who was guilty as charged and deserved to die.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: A Texas woman is brutally raped and murdered, and the trial sparks a racially charged debate over whether an innocent man has been condemned to death. But as new evidence comes to light, it seems her family may never know who killed Stacey Stites.

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: A young woman riding her bicycle is forced off the road and savagely murdered. Police chase her killer for decades until an overlooked clue ultimately leads to justice.

programme.title: True Conviction
programme.desc: An Upstate New York cabby is shot dead in his car, and the entire area is dumbfounded as to who would kill a man known for his great generosity. A rapid-fire investigation leverages technology to uncover a treacherous plot hatched in a salacious affair.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: Beloved wife and cardiac nurse Lorie Kirkley goes missing from the safety of her own home in what appears to be a burglary gone wrong. When several strange clues are found, the entire small town of Valparaiso, Indiana, comes under suspicion.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: Aurora, Indiana hadn't seen a murder in decades until Leigh Jennings was killed in her own home. Residents are horrified when the beloved mother and hairstylist is found dead. In a case where everyone liked the victim, anyone could be the killer.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: Elizabeth Baune was a pillar of her community until she was stabbed to death in her own home. The rural town of Payette, Idaho is horrified by the tragic death of a teacher, especially since Elizabeth's own good nature may have been behind her death.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: A man is hysterical when he finds his brother's girlfriend and roommate beaten with an iron and stabbed to death on the floor. The brothers appear devastated, but the discovery of her missing phone casts doubt on their alibis.

programme.title: The Lake Erie Murders
programme.desc: After they fail to turn up for an annual maple tapping celebration, Ian and Nancy Blackburn's lifeless bodies are discovered stuff into the trunk of their own car. The whirlwind investigation will unmask a monster who hid in plain sight.

programme.title: The Wonderland Murders
programme.desc: A cold case from Northern California heats up when Detective Molly Daul ties a brutal assault case she's working on to this twelve year old murder. And when this killer strikes in Portland, multiple homicide detectives team up to take him down.

programme.title: Hometown Homicide
programme.desc: 19-year-old Ali Kemp was at a pool in Leawood, Kansas in June 2002 when her father found her body in the pool's pump room. News reports and interviews with investigators and family tell the story of a father's quest to find his daughter's killer.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: When a single mom finds her dream man online, she can't believe her luck. But her quest to meet him soon turns into every mother's worst nightmare. As police scramble to avert tragedy, they discover the most elaborate web of lies they've ever seen.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: When a young mother of three plummets into depression, she turns to the internet to find comfort. What she discovers is a virtual world of fetishes and fantasies, where seemingly helpful hands hide the darkest of intentions.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: When a beautiful young woman moves to New York City, a chance encounter leads to romance. But her new boyfriend finds her popularity on social media hard to swallow. A tragic chain of events unfolds in which her unique tattoo plays a critical role.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A couple moves into their dream home on the same street where they've lived for years, only to find themselves engulfed in a wrenching conflict with their neighbour who believes he's the rightful owner of their property.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: Adopted 17-year-old Chelsea Schobert has always felt out of place at home. She seeks acceptance online where she meets Shawn. But as their relationship develops, all is not as it seems and the whole family is drawn into a devastating series of events.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: 50-year-old Beverly Carter is an internet savvy real-estate agent, but when she goes to meet a prospective buyer at a remote house, she goes missing. The search for Beverly goes viral, but depends on unravelling a web of false identities and fake clues.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A single mother and her daughter are delighted when a single dad and his two daughters move in next door. They become fast friends until molestation charges send their relationship spiralling into anger, accusation, and eventually multiple bloody deaths.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: An aspiring young boxer leaves in night to meet girl who added him on Facebook. The next day he if sound dead in his car and the murder reveals a dark family secret kept hidden for over 30 years.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: On July 7, 2007, 18-year old Jarrod Johnston walks away from his grandmother's home in Mississippi. His Dad sees similarities between his own sister's disappearance 25-years earlier and his son's. It becomes hard to hold out hope his son will ever return.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: 60-year old stonemason David Riemens, needs has one final meeting before driving to visit family. But he never returns home, and his truck is found abandoned. Desperate to find him, investigators look for clues, but David has vanished into thin air.

programme.title: Drew Peterson: An American Murder Mystery
programme.desc: When 23-year-old mother of four Stacy Peterson vanishes, suspicion lands on her police officer husband, Drew.

programme.title: A Time to Kill
programme.desc: A popular Wisconsin funeral director and his intern are murdered in cold blood. The case stalls for two years before a criminal profiler takes a fresh look and sees only one viable suspect -- someone the police never considered.

programme.title: Rizzoli & Isles
programme.desc: Jane and Maura are called out to the BCU 'body farm' (an academic research facility dedicated to the study of human decomposition) when a murder victim is found buried in a shallow grave among the research corpses.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: A brilliant convicted hacker is released from prison to help American and Chinese authorities track down a mysterious cybercriminal.

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: This film chronicles the sinking of the whaling ship Essex by an enormous whale. This event, which happened in real life, inspired author Herman Melville to write his famous novel Moby Dick.

programme.title: Dead Heat
programme.desc: A retired officer ends up on the wrong side of the law thanks to his fast-talking brother.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: A woman's wealthy, abusive ex commits apparent suicide, leaving his fortune to her. However, after lethal events begin to occur around her she begins to believe she is being targeted by an unseen stalker.

programme.title: Dark Water
programme.desc: A mother and daughter are haunted by the ghost of their apartment's former resident.

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: Ash, his chainsaw apparatus and his car are all mysteriously transported back to medieval times where he is captured by a besieged kingdom. His bungled attempt to help free his captors from dark forces results in the resurrection of a skeleton army.

programme.title: A Good Day to Die Hard
programme.desc: While visiting Russia, John McClane discovers his son, Jack, is a CIA operative. Together, John and Jack battle against a nuclear weapons heist in Russia.

programme.title: Holy Rollers
programme.desc: A young man is recommended by a friend for a good paying job, which turns out to be drug smuggling.

programme.title: A Family Thing
programme.desc: When a white man learns that his birth mother was black, he travels to Chicago to meet his new family.

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: A British upper class family seeks suitable mates for their five daughters.

programme.title: View From the Top
programme.desc: A small-town woman attempts to achieve her goal of becoming a flight attendant.

programme.title: Jane Eyre
programme.desc: After winning the heart of her employer, a governess discovers he is hiding a terrible secret.

programme.title: Queen & Slim
programme.desc: Two people out on their first date go on the run after they are forced to kill a violent police officer who attacks them during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Basic Instinct
programme.desc: A detective falls for a seductive mystery writer who has written a novel mirroring the recent murder of her rock-star boyfriend. As their relationship progresses, the detective realizes all is not as it initially seems when it comes to his new girlfriend.

programme.title: A Perfect Murder
programme.desc: When a millionaire discovers that his wife is having an affair, he hires her lover to kill her.

programme.title: Dead Man Walking
programme.desc: A nun becomes a death row inmate's spiritual advisor as he awaits his execution.

programme.title: The Mighty Quinn
programme.desc: A police chief in the Caribbean vows to solve a murder where the suspect is a folk hero.

programme.title: Runaway Train
programme.desc: Two escaped convicts and an innocent woman hide out on a train barreling through Alaska.

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: Twenty years after a boy died while performing in a school play, a group of friends breaks into the school at night to sabotage the set of the resurrected version of the production. Strange occurrences quickly go from eerie to terrifying.

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: An astronaut returns to earth after an impactful mission, and struggles to reintegrate.

programme.title: The Sessions
programme.desc: With the help of a beautiful therapist, a sympathetic priest, and his own unbridled sense of optimism and humor, a man embarks on an extraordinary personal journey to discover the wondrous pleasures that make life worth living.

programme.title: Cry Wolf
programme.desc: Eight teens play a dangerous game that has them turning up dead, one by one.

programme.title: A Hidden Life
programme.desc: A Catholic farmer refuses to fight for the Nazis.

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: Alongside his stepfather, a young man goes in search of his missing grandfather on a mythical island.

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: While assisting a scientific facility on Mars, a team of space marines is forced to go to war with demons that have been unleashed on the planet.

programme.title: Raising Arizona
programme.desc: An eccentric, childless couple decide to kidnap one baby from a set of quintuplets.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: The Brady family is back and facing serious financial trouble. With $20,000 in back taxes owned, the family risks losing their beloved home to their neighbour. The kids plot to secretly raise the money so they don't have to move to somewhere else.

programme.title: Stuber
programme.desc: An aggressive police officer forcefully recruits his uber driver to help with his work.

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: A woman who works as an elf at a year-round Christmas store meets a man and finds her life changing.

programme.title: Uncle Buck
programme.desc: An irresponsible bachelor is asked to take care of his nephew and nieces for a few days.

programme.title: An Ideal Husband
programme.desc: A husband's seemingly perfect life is threatened by evidence of a past misdeed.

programme.title: Pulling Strings
programme.desc: A U.S. diplomat working in Mexico City is saved after a night of drinking by a local Mariachi singer whose visa she rejected the day before.

programme.title: The Dark Half
programme.desc: A fictional character manifests itself in physical form and begins killing people.

programme.title: Motherless Brooklyn
programme.desc: A detective with Tourette's Syndrome attempts to solve the murder of his mentor, in 1957 Brooklyn, New York.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: On the verge of having their conspiracy exposed, members of the government will stop at nothing to erase all evidence of their top secret programs, even the agents involved.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: In Thailand, a group of Christian aid workers recruit John Rambo to guide them up the Salween River to deliver medical supplies to the Karen tribe of neighbouring Burma (aka Myanmar).

programme.title: Two for the Money
programme.desc: After a career-ending injury, a football star gets too close to a renowned sports gambler.

programme.title: The Others
programme.desc: A mother of two begins to suspect that the dark mansion they inhabit is actually haunted.

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes II
programme.desc: National Guard recruits are on their final day of desert training. In order to pass their final test, they must battle a vicious group of mutants.

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: During a routine reconnaissance mission, Lieutenant Chris Burnett photographs something no one was meant to see and is shot down. Trapped behind enemy lines, Burnett struggles to survive the relentless pursuit of countless hostile troops.

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: After refusing a mission, an assassin is forced to hide out in a small town.

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent escapes from Earth seconds before it is destroyed to make way for a hyperspace highway.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A widowed mother and her two daughters add a new stunt to their séance scam, a spirit board. When the youngest finds the board, she contacts a spirit and is possessed. Confronting their fears, the small family risks everything to save themselves.

programme.title: Proof of Life
programme.desc: A woman hires a professional negotiator when guerrillas in South America kidnap her husband.

programme.title: The Good Lie
programme.desc: A group of Sudanese refugees arrive in America to start a new life. They're met at the airport by an employment agency counselor who winds up helping them navigate the 20th century and rebuild their lives.

programme.title: Won't Back Down
programme.desc: A mother recruits a disillusioned but caring teacher to help fix the broken inner city school her daughter attends.

programme.desc: A security guard who prevented casualties from a bomb planted at the 1996 Atlanta Olympics is vilified by the media, who falsely report he is a terrorist involved in the incident.

programme.desc: A detective battles terrorists at an airport when a plot threatens hundreds of passengers.

programme.desc: A team of bomb technicians with only a few days left on their tour of Iraq, struggle to control their reckless new sergeant. The new leader puts the excitement of urban combat ahead of the safety of his men, forcing them into deadly situations.

programme.title: Born on the Fourth of July
programme.desc: A small-town athlete enthusiastically enlists to fight in the Vietnam War and returns home, paralyzed from the chest down. After a nightmarish stint in a veterans' hospital, he pulls his life together and becomes an anti-war activist in the process.

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: A pregnant police chief investigates a bizarre murder and kidnapping in Minnesota.

programme.desc: When forensic psychologist Dr. Alex Cross' niece goes missing, Cross goes to North Carolina to investigate the serial killer Casanova. He suspects he is the kidnapper, and gets help from a woman who escaped from where Casanova was holding her captive.
